summary:
shoot arrows from your hands really fast!
theres 2 spells one for rapid fire and charge, the other is a single shot
descriptionHtml:
this is my first mod i made from scratch. all credit goes to me (sparky1570)

theres 2 spells one for rapid fire and charge, the other is a single shot.

Video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CjLKFzxVj64

i was looking for a rapid fire bow that i could just hold down the fire button and it would continuously fire, but i guess i was asking for to much. i then looked for a spell that could do the same and after hours of searching an extensive number of sights i found nothing. i was very disappointed. i then decided to learn and make my own mods. after several hours of figuring out the development kit and even more hours getting the spell to work and sound just right, ive finally made it and it is complete for all of you to enjoy. if you find a problem please let me know and i can try to fix it.

how to obtain:
the spell is located at white run, at dragonsearch (castle), in wizard man\'s room, in a chest behind the big map. video tutorial to find it here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jbc9dS7-_qg&feature=youtu.be

known bugs:

-combining the spell creating one big shot, slowly increases height after a distance. as shown in the video. you will notice it.( i do not know how to fix this, any help will be much appreciated.)


messing around with the spell..... shooting massive/explosive (effect) tomatoes:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyO7CF506jo
author: sparky1570
